sn10:1.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati indakūṭe pabbate, indakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10:1.1.3: Atha kho indako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn10:2.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn10:2.1.2: Atha kho sakkanāmako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn10:3.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10:3.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
sn10:3.1.3: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:3.1.6: Yāva jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo yadi vā pana so samaṇako”ti.
sn10:3.2.1: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kāyaṃ upanāmesi.
sn10:3.2.3: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:3.2.8: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
sn10:3.2.9: “Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya;
sn10:3.2.10: api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadā kaṅkhasī”ti. ()
sn10:4.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati maṇimālike cetiye maṇibhaddassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10:4.1.2: Atha kho maṇibhaddo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn10:5.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10:5.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā upāsikāya sānu nāma putto yakkhena gahito hoti.
sn10:5.1.3: Atha kho sā upāsikā paridevamānā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn10:6.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10:6.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anuruddho rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya dhammapadāni bhāsati.
sn10:6.1.3: Atha kho piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī puttakaṃ evaṃ tosesi:
sn10:7.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn10:7.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
sn10:7.1.3: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
sn10:7.1.4: Atha kho punabbasumātā yakkhinī puttake evaṃ tosesi:
sn10:8.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati sītavane.
sn10:8.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati rājagahaṃ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
sn10:8.1.5: Tāvadeva ca pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti. Athassa anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa etadahosi:
sn10:8.1.7: Sve dānāhaṃ kālena bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gamissāmī”ti buddhagatāya satiyā nipajji.
sn10:8.1.8: Rattiyā sudaṃ tikkhattuṃ vuṭṭhāsi pabhātanti maññamāno.
sn10:8.1.9: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sivathikadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
sn10:8.1.11: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nagaramhā nikkhamantassa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10:8.1.12: Atha kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10:8.4.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10:8.4.2: Dutiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10:8.4.3: Dutiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10:8.7.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10:8.7.2: Tatiyampi kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa āloko antaradhāyi, andhakāro pāturahosi, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso udapādi, tatova puna nivattitukāmo ahosi.
sn10:8.7.3: Tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussāvesi:
sn10:8.10.1: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa andhakāro antaradhāyi, āloko pāturahosi, yaṃ ahosi bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, so paṭippassambhi.
sn10:8.10.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena sītavanaṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn10:8.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya abbhokāse caṅkamati.
sn10:8.11.2: Addasā kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn10:8.11.3: Disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn10:8.11.4: Nisajja kho bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn10:8.11.6: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati, nāmena maṃ bhagavā ālapatīti, haṭṭho udaggo tattheva bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:9.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10:9.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sukkā bhikkhunī mahatiyā parisāya parivutā dhammaṃ deseti.
sn10:9.1.3: Atha kho sukkāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn10:10.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10:10.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako sukkāya bhikkhuniyā bhojanaṃ adāsi.
sn10:10.1.3: Atha kho sukkāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn10:11.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn10:11.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro upāsako cīrāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi.
sn10:11.1.4: Atha kho cīrāya bhikkhuniyā abhippasanno yakkho rājagahe rathikāya rathikaṃ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn10:12.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
sn10:12.1.3: Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:12.1.8: Dutiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:12.1.13: Tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:12.1.18: Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn10:12.1.23: Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti.
sn10:12.1.24: “Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
sn10:12.1.25: Api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadā kaṅkhasī”ti ().
